org.needle4j.mock

Class MockitoProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.needle4j.mock.MockitoProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MockProvider, SpyProvider

    public class MockitoProvider
extends Object
implements MockProvider, SpyProvider
    A Mockito specific MockProvider implementation. For more details, see the Mockito documentation.
